episodes.title: Lost Years Inside a Dangerous Cult | Carlos Santana Documentary
episodes.description:
Carlos Santana’s spiritual awakening in the 1970s didn’t lead him to peace -  it led him into a secretive movement that reshaped his identity, strained his marriage, and nearly derailed his career. This documentary explores the years he spent under the influence of a powerful guru, the transformation that followed, and the eventual unraveling that brought him back to himself.

A story of devotion, control, and the high cost of spiritual surrender.
